abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.backoff: Device does not accept pairing requests at this time (you might have entered an invalid PIN code too many times), try again later.
abort.device_did_not_pair: No attempt to finish pairing process was made from the device.
abort.device_not_found: Device was not found during discovery, please try adding it again.
abort.inconsistent_device: Expected protocols were not found during discovery. This normally indicates a problem with multicast DNS (Zeroconf). Please try adding the device again.
abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network

error.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network

confirm.description:
You are about to add `{name}` of type `{type}` to Home Assistant.

**To complete the process, you may have to enter multiple PIN codes.**

Please note that you will *not* be able to power off your Apple TV with this integration. Only the media player in Home Assistant will turn off!
confirm.title: Confirm adding Apple TV

pair_no_pin.description: Pairing is required for the `{protocol}` service. Please enter PIN {pin} on your device to continue.
pair_no_pin.title: Pairing

pair_with_pin.description: Pairing is required for the `{protocol}` protocol. Please enter the PIN code displayed on screen. Leading zeros shall be omitted, i.e. enter 123 if the displayed code is 0123.
pair_with_pin.title: Pairing

password.description: A password is required by `{protocol}`. This is not yet supported, please disable password to continue.
password.title: Password required

protocol_disabled.description:
Pairing is required for `{protocol}` but it is disabled on the device. Please review potential access restrictions (e.g. allow all devices on the local network to connect) on the device.

You may continue without pairing this protocol, but some functionality will be limited.
protocol_disabled.title: Pairing not possible

restore_device.description: Reconfigure this device to restore its functionality.
restore_device.title: Device reconfiguration

service_problem.description: A problem occurred while pairing protocol `{protocol}`. It will be ignored.
service_problem.title: Failed to add service

user.description:
Start by entering the device name (e.g. Kitchen or Bedroom) or IP address of the Apple TV you want to add.

If you cannot see your device or experience any issues, try specifying the device IP address.
user.title: Set up a new Apple TV

data.start_off: Do not turn device on when starting Home Assistant
